mentions.candidate: Nick Clegg set the election campaign on fire last night with a stunning victory in the first leaders' debate. ... Clegg emerged as the clear winner - beating both Gordon Brown and David Cameron.

issues.governance: Nick Clegg directly told millions of viewers, 'Nick Clegg said, 'Do not let anyone tell you that the only choice is the old politics. We can do something new, something different this time.'

contactInformation.address: FREEPOST Liberal Democrats, RSCL-UKCK-XCBZ, 53 Reachview Close, NW1

quotes.text: Nick Clegg was clear and sincere...he emerged as the clear winner.
Nick Clegg was the clear winner

images.caption: Nick Clegg wins first ever debate

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet showcases various poll results from ITV News, YouGov, ComRes, and AngusReid highlighting Nick Clegg's performance in the debate.
